sentences.english: I should be the last to reject such a loud statement.
sentences.chinese: 我是決不想反駁這樣一個振振有詞的聲明的。
他表示了振振有詞的抗議。

sentences.english: His voice rose with the conviction of his chapel speeches.
sentences.chinese: 他提高了嗓音，像在教堂裏講話一般振振有詞。
